option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
filenames of the fitacf format files.
files are in the fit format.
filename of the fit format file.

synopsis.p: Generates statistics on fit or fitacf format files. The statistics give the start and end time of the file, the station identifier and the number records in the file

description.p: Generates statistics on fit or fitacf format files.
The contents are written to standard output
